# Introduction 
```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false
#| output: false

# libraries 
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(patchwork)

# data import 
dist_22 = st_read("data/fl_cong_adopted_2022/P000C0109.shp") # 2022 Congressional District Map 
dist_20 = st_read("data/fl_cong_2015_to_2021/fl_cong_2015_to_2021.shp") # 2015-2021 Congressional District Map 
```

This project examines the effect of the redistricting process on voter turnout. We use the change in maps from 2020 to 2022 in the state of Florida as a case study to examine this effect. 

```{r}
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| code-fold: true

# plots comparing two maps 
plot1 = ggplot(dist_20)+
  geom_sf(fill = "white")+
  theme_void()+
  ggtitle("2015-2021 Map")

plot2 = ggplot(dist_22)+
  geom_sf(fill = "white")+
  theme_void()+
 ggtitle("2022 Map")

plot1 + plot2
```
